description.value:
Access You are from Mediogalti Island.

You have learned how to stalk your foes and slay them with a sawtooth sabre. You become trained in Stealth and Assassin Lore; if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Whenever your proficiency in any weapon increases to expert or beyond, you also gain that new proficiency with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.Sawtooth Saber]{Sawtooth Saber}.

Special You cannot select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Red Mantis assassin archetype.

value.value: member of the Red Mantis assassins
